Tools For Startups!

Edit this page on GitHub

October 07, 2015

I gathered this list for folks in Startup Weekend Tehran to speed up their progress by using them. I thought it might be useful to others as well.

Feel free to contribute on Github. Hope you make something cool. Ping me if you do :)

Learn To Code :

  • Code4Startup Learn to Code by creating Real Life Startup projects
  • Always Learning The best resources for learning programming & design
  • Codecademy Learn to code interactively, for free.
  • Swifty Learn how to code in Swift.
  • FreeCodeCamp Let’s learn to code by building projects for nonprofits
  • The iOS 9 Foundations Course by bitfountain
  • Atom A hackable text editor for the 21st Century
  • Sublime Text The text editor you’ll fall in love with
  • Code School Learn to Code by Doing
  • WebsiteSetup.org How to Make a Website
  • Code.org Anybody can learn computer science
  • TNW Academy Hand-picked online courses (NEW)


Free Online Courses

  • SkillShare Learn from Creative Professionals and Companies
  • Khan Academy You can learn anything… For free. For everyone. Forever.
  • Coursera Free Online Courses From Top Universities
  • CreativeLive Free Live Online Classes — Learn. Be Inspired.
  • edX Free online courses from the world’s best universities
  • HP Life Learning initiative for entrepreneurs
  • Udemy Online Courses Anytime, Anywhere.
  • Stanford Online Courses Online Courses by Stanford University.


Free eBooks for Developer

  • Ruby On Rails Tutorial by Michael Hartl
  • Build Your First Node.js App by Scotch.io
  • Learning Laravel 5 : Building Practical Applications by Nathan Wu
  • Your First Meteor Application by David Turnbull
  • Developer’s Guide to App Marketing by Paddle.com
  • free-programming-ebooks Github list by Victor Felder
  • 70+ e-books on popular technologies for free by Syncfusion


Project Collaboration / Task Management.

  • Trello free, flexible, and visual way to organize anything with anyone.
  • Slack a messaging app for teams: everything in one place.
  • Taskulu helps you manage your projects easier by allowing you to define roles and assign permissions within your projects.
  • Wunderlist godlike tool for organize your list and tasks
  • Stormboard Brainstorm, organize, prioritize and act on the best ideas.
  • HipChat Group and private chat, file sharing, and integrations.
  • Evernote The workspace for your life’s work
  • Campfire Team collaboration with real time chat.
  • join.me Free Screen Sharing, Online Meetings & Web Conferencing
  • SyncPad Real-time whiteboard collaboration
  • HiveFlux Plan and track your team’s work in real time
  • Gibbon Bring knowledge to your team more effectively.
  • Complete A social, task completion app.
  • Toggl Free Time Tracking Software


e-Commerce

  • WooCommerce The world’s favorite eCommerce solution in WordPress
  • OpenCart is an open-source, PHP-based ecommerce solution.
  • Magento Community Edition free and open source version of the ecommerce platform.
  • Spree Commerce open-source ecommerce based on Ruby on Rails.
  • Drupal Commerce by Commerce Guys. Built on top of Drupal CMS.
  • A Brief Guide To Selling Digital Products by Nathan Barry
  • Moltin The quicker way to build eCommerce applications.
  • Tictail Launch your shop with just a few swipes
  • OpenEntry Your Open Entry into E-commerce Opportunities
  • Carousell Sell in a Snap, Buy with a Chat
  • YouCanBook.me customer bookings straight into your calendar
  • BetaOut The All-in-one Ecommerce & B2C Marketing Software (NEW)


Email Marketing

  • SendinBlue Easily manage your Email Marketing campaigns, Transactional Emails, and SMS messages.
  • MailChimp Send 12,000 emails to 2,000 subscribers for free.
  • Mandrill a new way for apps to send transactional email.
  • Mailgun The email service for developers
  • SendGrid Email Delivery & Transactional Email Service
  • MailerLite Send Beautiful Emails


Free HTML Templates

  • HTML5 UP Responsive HTML5 and CSS3 Site Templates
  • Start Bootstrap Free HTML starter themes and templates for Bootstrap
  • Templated A collection of 848 free CSS and HTML5 site templates, designed & built by Cherry + AJ.
  • Bootstrap Zero The largest open-source, free Bootstrap templates
  • w3layouts 100 Free Responsive HTML5 CSS3 Website Templates


Free Icons

  • Font Awesome the iconic font and CSS framework
  • Iconmonstr Free simple icons for your next project
  • GLYPHICONS precisely prepared monochromatic icons and symbols
  • Material Design Icons by Google. 750 glyphs as part of the Material Design system icons.
  • Smarticons 800+ free icons for the modern web
  • Captain icon +350 Awesome free vector icons
  • Endless Icons Free Icon Libary
  • PaymentFont a sleek Payment Webfont
  • Makeappicon Generate app icons of all sizes with a click!
  • Themify Icons 320+ Free Icons For Web Design & Apps
  • IconStore Free Icon Packs by First-Class Designers
  • Flaticon The largest database of free vector icons
  • Free Icons List Link 1
  • Free Icons List Link 2
  • Free Icons List Link 3
  • Icon Finder Search through 640,748 icons or browse 11,696 icon sets.


Stock free photos:

  • Death to The Stock Photo Join free email list + get photos monthly!
  • AllTheFreeStock One Place to Find All Free Stock Images, Videos, Sound Effects and Icons.
  • FindA.Photo 100% free stock images from them all.
  • Unsplash Free High-Resolution Photos. 10 new photos every 10 days.
  • Picjumbo Totally free photos for your personal works
  • Gratisography by Ryan McGuire and free of copyright restrictions.
  • Startup Stock Focuses on startup photography and technology.
  • Pexels Best free stock photos in one place.
  • Jay Mantri free pics. do anything. make magic.
  • StockSnap Powerful search engine for finding stock images in one place.
  • Streetwill Free vintage photos to use any way you want.
  • Life Of Pix Free stock photos, high-resolution.
  • Shutteroo Free images, no worries by Klaye Morrison.


Web/Mobile Analytics

  • Google Analytics Turn insights into action
  • Piwik Open source web analytics software
  • Mixpanel The most advanced analytics platform ever for mobile & web.
  • Segment we make customer data simple
  • HeapAnalytics captures every user action in your web or iOS app
  • GoSquared Real-time customer analytics
  • TapStream Rocket fuel for mobile apps.
  • Keen.io Take control of your analytics.
  • WizRocket intelligent user engagement across mobile, web & email

Version Control

  • GitHub Build software better, together.
  • BitBucket Git and Mercurial code management for teams
  • Pixelapse Visual version control for designers
  • GitLab offers free unlimited (private) repositories and collaborators


Growth Hacking

  • Optimizely leading platform for testing & personalization across devices
  • SumoMe Tools to Grow Your Website’s Traffic
  • Hotjar All-in-one Analytics and Feedback.
  • Intercom User Intelligence and Customer Communication
  • SocialMention Real-time social media search and analysis
  • GrowthHackers A Community for Growth-Focused Marketers
  • clicktotweet easiest way promote, share & track content on Twitter
  • Hello Bar show the right message at the right time to website visitors.
  • Growth Hacker Resources List by autosend.io
  • Find a Growth Hacker for Your Startup by Startup Marketing
  • Growth Tools The Ultimate Database of Growth Hacking Tools
  • IntroBar Welcome and entice visitors from specific sources (NEW)
  • elevio educating your users, when and where it’s needed most (NEW)


Social Media Management

  • HeadTalker Take Your Message Viral on Social Media.
  • Thunderclap Amplify any message using social media.
  • Buffer is the easiest way to publish on social media
  • Hootsuite Get serious about social.
  • TweetDeck Twitter tools-real-time tracking, organizing & engagement.
  • SumAll All-in-One Social Media & Ecommerce Dashboard
  • Wondr lets you start a chat session for your Twitter followers


Product News & Startups

  • Product Hunt a curation of the best new products, every day.
  • Hacker News daily news for startup folks and hackers.
  • Reddit the front page of the internet
  • AngelList Badass platform for startups, investors and job seekers.
  • BetaList Discover tomorrow’s startups, today.
  • Funderbeam Discover, track, and analyze startups.
  • StartupLi.st Find. Follow. Recommend startups.
  • TechCrunch The latest technology news and information on startups.
  • Startup Launch List Articles you need to read before launching startup
  • TheNextWeb Technology based media.


Documents Management

  • Docady Manage Life’s Most Important Paperwork

Landing Page builder:

  • AppStop turn your App Store description into a landing page

Hybrid Mobile Applications

  • Ionic framework for IOS versions and android versions
  • Ionic creator Creator makes it easy to rapidly build Ionic mobile apps
  • Framework7 framework for hybrid mobile application UI and development
  • Genymotion Tool for test application
  • AppStarter Build native iOS prototypes online


Web Development :

  • Larvael framework + html + css bootstrap
  • Ruby & rails or python django for back end
  • For SPA applications:
  • Backbone.js MV* framework + underscore for html engine Or Angular.js.
